X-Request-Id.description: Echoed from request or generated by server; useful for log correlation.

dry_run.description: Present and true when request used ?dry_run=1

ProblemDetails.description: RFC7807 Problem Details (pilot). Extended with request_id, incident_id, errors[]

incident_id.description: Present only for 500 errors to correlate logs

invalid_params.description: Validation details for 400 responses (alias to errors)

request_id.description: Correlation id echoed as X-Request-Id header

done.description: Derived legacy boolean (status=="done"). Prefer using status for writes.

status.description: Authoritative state. On create/update maps to done=(status==done).

CsrfToken.description: Required for state-changing operations when strict CSRF is enabled. Server also sets a SameSite cookie used to validate the header token.
CsrfToken.name: X-CSRF-Token

info.description: Problem Details (RFC7807) is the canonical error format across all endpoints. Legacy ErrorXXX components have been removed per ADR-003.
info.title: Unified Platform API

parameters.description: If provided include tenant overrides; omit to list only defaults
parameters.name: tenant_id

parameters.description: Filter to a single limit name; if absent but tenant_id supplied returns union of defaults + overrides
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: If true (1) perform validation + diff only (no persistence)
parameters.name: dry_run
